unnormalised: Hey, that's interesting! I've heard great things about Ayurveda. My cousin, Priya, went to a retreat in Kerala last year around Onam and said it completely changed her life. She got some amazing treatments. I've been thinking of trying it out myself, maybe a panchakarma treatment near Rishikesh. Is it expensive? I wonder how many days we have to spend? Would love to try that yummy Kerala style biryani afterwards!
normalised: Hey, that is interesting! I have heard great things about Ayurveda. My cousin, Priya, went to a retreat in Kerala last year around Onam and said it completely changed her life. She got some amazing treatments. I have been thinking of trying it out myself, maybe a panchakarma treatment near Rishikesh. Is it expensive? I wonder how many days we have to spend?
